name: menu-qr-pro
description: Professional QR Menu & Digital Menu solution for restaurants

scripts.lint: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:js
scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o style.min.css style.css && cleancss -o admin-style.min.css admin-style.css
scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs script.js -o script.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs admin-script.js -o admin-script.min.js -c -m
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run make-pot && npm run zip

author: Luiff Dev
